item.title: Devops Project CI/CD With Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, K8s
item.description: The course The course is below. https://udemy.com/course/valaxy-devops/ My work My work on this course can be found at the following links: https://github.com/HenryFBP/valaxydevopsproject https://github.com/HenryFBP/valaxydevopsproject-hello-world-app Forked from respectively: https://github.com/yankils/Simple-DevOps-Project https://github.com/yankils/hello-world Section 1: Introduction 1. Introduction We’ll use Git for SCM, Jenkins for CICD pipelines, Maven as build tool, Ansible for configuraton mgmt post-deployment, Docker to host aps, k8s to manage our docker containers. We’ll use AWS to set all of this up. DevOps Flow Devs usually push code to Git.
